features: SIMPLIFY DISH WASHING -- How to determine whether the tableware is dirty or clean? Now, this question will not bother us any more. Dishwasher magnet clean dirty sign is a fantastic reminder and communication tool. From now on, we can know whether the dishes are cleaned without opening the dishwasher, which is especially convenient for busy families.

PREMIUM QUALITY & WATER-RESISTANT -- Dishwasher magnet, 3.5 x 2.3 inches, which is made of strong magnet, bright printed layer and waterproof protective layer. We can easily view and read bright font tips anywhere in the kitchen. The strong magnet covered with high-quality printing film can prevent unnecessary surface scratches and provide strong suction.

A GREAT CREATIVE GIFT -- Dirty clean dishwasher magnet as a gift is a great idea. Considering that it is affordable, practical and interesting, you can share it with friends and family. This dishwasher sign complements any kitchen decoration.

SUITABLE FOR ALL DISHWASHERS -- Clean and dirty dishwasher magnet is equipped with strong magnets, which match with any kitchen dishwasher on the market and are durable and lasting. Tip: There is a sticky metal plate, which can be attached to a non-magnetic dishwasher.

CUSTOMER FIRST PRINCIPLE -- QMMD strive to create kitchen tools that customers are not only happy to buy, but also satisfied to own. If you have any dissatisfaction with our products, you can directly refund or contact us at any time.
body.description: A clean dirty sign for dishwasher you will like. Simple | Functional We have developed a kitchen tool designed to look gorgeous on any modern dishwasher, so that you can always know whether the dishes are dirty or clean, which can make your life easier.Dishwasher clean dirty magnet sign is very simple to use, just flip it, and it can display CLEAN or DIRTY text. It uses color coding to let you know at a glance whether the dishes are ready or not. Make your kitchen look expensive and professional when your friends come over. It can stay in place and is super easy for your family to use. It is easy to read and can quickly let you know whether the plate is dirty or clean in a few seconds.Clean dirty magnet is suitable for families, sharing office space, which can eliminate guesses, and takes the funcation of reminders (so you don't have to worry about your spouse getting angry! ) and it looks great in any background!Content: 1 x Dishwasher dirty clean magnet1 x Bonus adhesive metal plate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute, funny, magnetic, perfect for my dishwasher haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does exactly what you want.
reviews.reviewText: Comes with a double sided magnet and an adhesive plate that you can put onto something non-magnetic if needed so the magnet will stick.Looks great, seems to be of high quality. I didn’t need the adhesive plate for my dishwasher and the magnet stays where it is put, but flips easily.Only issue was it arrived slightly bent. I put it underneath a few heavy books for a day or two and it’s flat and straight now.I do wish they had used different colors on each side to make it easier to tell from a distance, but I am still happy I chose this one because I do like the design and the quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far it's good!
reviews.reviewText: I've only had it a week, but this magnet is hella nice so far. As a someone with goth aesthetics and dad joke humor, it's seriously perfect. Only possible con I see, I can feel the layers of the stickers and magnet, like a little forbidden sandwich. Over time it might start to peel. But it's thick, looks like the picture, is a decent size, and sticks well to my dishwasher

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but so helpful
reviews.reviewText: This is one of those random small things I never knew I needed until I saw it lolI love that it’s a magnet and just sticks right to my dishwasher

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sign for dishwasher
reviews.reviewText: I love the design and the size of this item. It’s not small enough that I can’t read it, but not too big that it takes up too much space. It’s easy to flip it back and forth and helps me or anyone else coming to my house to know whether it’s clean or not. It flips with ease and also has a nice hold to my dishwasher. It also came with a metal plate that you can use if your dishwasher is not magnetic and I thought that was a nice addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple & To The Point!
reviews.reviewText: This magnet is perfect with my black dishwasher. It takes the guessing work out of doing dishes. The magnet works well and is easily flipped. The one note I would make is to make the size a bit larger as it is pretty small. Or they could always lower the price for the current size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong magnet that's useful
reviews.reviewText: These magnets are exactly as described. They are useful, good looking, and are pretty strong. These are not the type of magnets that will just flop on the floor, but stay put really well, even if bumped. Even our toddler cannot seem to move them or pry them off of the dishwasher. I highly recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024

reviews.reviewText: I love these reversible magnets .Anything that makes life easier, I am all up in it!These are fun and easy to use.
